definition: love of beauty/wishing to appear beautiful/to set store by one's appearance
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

pinyin: ai4 mei3 zhi1 xin1 , ren2 jie1 you3 zhi1

sentences.chinese: 爱美丽一直在寻求孤独。

sentences.english: The sage said, The heart of loving beauty exists everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 古人也云，爱美之心，人皆有之。

sentences.english: It's human nature to love beauty.
Saint-Emilion is the oldest wine area of the Bordeaux region.
sentences.chinese: 圣爱美浓是波尔多地区最古老的酒区。

sentences.english: To be frank, do you love beauty?
Lewd , the heart person of the love of beauty all has it.
sentences.chinese: 好色慕艾，爱美之心人皆有之。

sentences.english: However, for the beauty of expression that people are different and very different.
sentences.chinese: 可是人们对于爱美的表达方式却千差万别，大相径庭。

sentences.english: And more than beauty he loved Ruth.
sentences.chinese: 而他爱露丝又甚于爱美。

sentences.english: To love beauty is to see the light.
The rise of "secondhand" famous brandname clothes shops has provided natty dressers with a channel for exchange.
sentences.chinese: 名牌服饰店的兴起，使得爱美人士有了衣物交流管道。

sentences.english: Heart of beauty in everyone, not to mention it is in adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 爱美之心人皆有之，更何况是正处在青春期呢。

sentences.english: She starred in films like "Gentleman Prefer Blondes" in nineteen fifty-three.
sentences.chinese: 她主演电影中，像“绅士爱美人”在1963五十。

sentences.english: Aimei bumps into Youqing on her shopping trip.
sentences.chinese: 爱美去买爬山运动服，遇到有情。

sentences.english: Saint Emilion wines are considered the most robust of the Bordeaux.
sentences.chinese: 圣爱美浓葡萄酒比认为是波尔多地区最浓烈的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: I love the winter, the more love beautiful snow.
sentences.chinese: 我爱冬天，更爱美丽的雪景。

sentences.english: But the little stomach of bosomy strike is occasionally from the biggest since knowing love beauty painful.
sentences.chinese: 但鼓鼓的小肚子是偶从懂得爱美以来最大的痛。

definition: to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism

pinyin: ai4 mei3 zhi1 xin1 , ren2 jie1 you3 zhi1

definition: to show off one's good looks shamelessly

lit. to present oneself confidently to the emperor, without makeup (as did the sister of Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]) (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) to show one's natural features, without makeup/to present oneself just as one is, without artifice
